text: Lon meungpeusisat jih nyan bak salah Lon meungpeuleumah dum angan-angan Bek jijak keunan bak jalan Allah Lon yue koh bak jih geulinyueng unta Jipubuet sigra hana meuubah Keubeu ngon leumo kameng keubiri Meunan cit lagi geulinyueng jiplah Lon yue ubah dum peuneujeut Tuhan Jipubuet rijang hana meuilah Teuma barangsoe jipeujeut chetan Keu wali jih nyan rugoe that leupah
